author: Jeanette
text: Bought a pair of boots and when they arrived they had been tossed in an oversized box with no padding, tissue etc. Looked  like I had purchased from a thrift store. eBay sellers show more respect for merchandise than Real Real obviously does now. They use to be a very good company. Appears they have given all that up for profit.
title: Poor packing

author: customer
text: Size guidelines were misleading. Did not receive a full refund. Will not use this site again.
title: Size guidelines were misleading

author: dolcegal
text: The earrings were real but one of them came.bent and missing a metal fastener. They also came dirty.
title: The earrings were real but one of them…

author: Lynne Yabroudi
text: I still haven’t gotten my package and they said please allow 7-10 days and it’s been two weeks and still waiting on customer service to contact me.
title: I still haven’t gotten my package and…

author: customer
text: I ordered a dress which did not arrive. I contacted customer service who in turn contacted UPS. They said it was delivered on Feb 16. Well, surprise, it was delivered on Feb 22. Either TRR or UPS is lying.
title: UNHAPPY AND CONFUSED

author: customer
text: I received the shoes as expected and in the condition shown in the website however, there wasn’t any reference to the shoes fit. These ones run really small. I order half size bigger and they are still small. I wish you guys include this information for all brands. Unfortunately, I have to return the shoes
title: I received the shoes as expected and in…

author: Maraya
text: Have purchased many, many items, but continue to be frustrated by the fact that their photography stylists pin and tuck and zhoosh up clothing on the mannequin to make it more attractive, and then the disappointed buyer gets to pay for return shipping.
title: They pin clothes to make them look cuter.

author: Nwaf
text: The rain jacket I ordered was listed as a womens large but when it arrived, it’s actually a child’s large. I obviously can’t wear it.
title: Wrong size listed

author: customer
text: Both of my recent orders & a return were difficult. I then ordered another LV wallet last week & it still has not shipped & I have not received any updates!  I’ve have messaged & received a message that they are contacting the warehouse. Still no response! It was a final sale & I am out 388.87. I will not be purchasing again. I will delete my account once (hopefully) this is favorably resolved. Very poor experience.
title: Very poor experience

author: customer
text: Never received my order
title: Never received my order

author: consigner
text: Consigning with them for the first time, a problem occurred and the realreal has been a nightmare to deal with and are very slow and uncommunicative throughout the whole process
title: Consigning with them for the first…

author: not authentic
text: I just left a Cartier store in Dallas and they just told me this was not authenticated and it is not real. They said it is real gold but it is NOT Cartier…
title: I just left a Cartier store in Dallas…

author: customerGablesgirl
text: Sadly I have to return the Gucci shoes I bought. The condition was listed as "Good" but there is gum or another sticky substance on them that was not listed.
title: Sadly I have to return the Gucci shoes…

author: Rose
text: terrible unhelpful
title: terrible unhelpful

author: customer
text: No one responds to emails.
title: No one responds to emails

author: Paula Abbott
text: The purse is nice but much more used abs worn than expected
title: The purse is nice but much more used…

author: customer
text:
No where on the listing did it say the sizing was in Australian sizing rather than US 

Item was then not returnable because it was on sale 

Extremely frustrating
title: Incorrect sizing not returnable

author: rose shawlee
text:
The product was in much, much worse condition than described on the website. I emailed the company to see if perhaps the wrong was sent and I never heard back. 

Awful experience.
title: The product was in much

author: Kaley
text: I didn’t get this package. I don’t see a refund. UPS told us that you sent it late and they were bringing it the following day but instead I found a man outside that set my ring off, being suspicious and looking around. This was just not a good thing all around. I also had a hard time getting someone to respond :(
title: NEVER RECEIVED ORDER

author: SE
text: Purchased a ring for my wife.  Overall the ring is beautiful but was not the size cited by therealreal.  We had to take it to a local jeweler and have it sized properly.  Small expense but description and sizing need to be accurate.
title: Purchased a ring for my wife
